item.title: Notes: Sadler - 1998 - Formative assessment
item.description: References Citekey: @Sadler1998 Sadler, D. R. (1998). Formative assessment: Revisiting the territory. Assessment in Education: Principles, Policy & Practice, 5(1), 77â€“84. doi:10.1080⁄0969595980050104 Notes This is a commentary on Black & Williams (1998) – a review article on the effective of formative feedback on learning. Highlights A key argument is that students are already assessing their own work and generating their own feedback, and that higher education should build on this ability.
